Malden.Isaac Fay House:
The Isaac Fay House is a historic house located at 125 Antrim Street in Cambridge, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The 2-1/2 story wood frame house was built in 1843, and is one of the city's best examples of a Greek Revival side-hall plan. It also has distinctive features, including a cupola and an Ionic wraparound porch, that are not found on any surviving period building in the city.
